method.name: add_entity
method.description: Adds a new entity to the builder. The built entity have [param entity] added to it. TODO: Add code examples.

method.name: add_pair
method.description: Adds a pair to the builder. The built entity will have the pair of [param first] and [param second] added to it. TODO: Add code examples.

method.name: build
method.description: Creates a new entity from the settings of the builder and returns a reference to it. TODO: Add code examples.

method.name: build_id
method.description: Creates a new entity from the settings of the builder and returns a its id. TODO: Add code examples.

method.name: get_world
method.description: Returns the world the built entity will be added to.

method.name: new_in_world
method.description: Returns a new builder in [param world]. TODO: Add code examples.

method.name: set_name
method.description: Sets the name of the entity to be built.

method.name: set_parent
method.description: Sets the parent of the entity to be built.

method.name: set_target_entity
method.description: Sets the target entity. When set, the settings of the builder will be applied to [param entity], otherwise a new entity will be created according to the settings of the builder.
